EmailTemplate.name: Breakfast & Lunch Series-TN reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Give American Student Assistance your feedback at breakfast on October 23rd
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
It’s just around the corner! American Student Assistance’s Interactive Feedback Session
We look forward to seeing you for breakfast at an interactive feedback session on October 23 from 7:30 – 9 a.m. at the Sheraton Marriott Cool Springs, 700 Cool Springs Blvd., Franklin, TN.
If you have questions about this event or need more information, please contact Lynne Cao at lcao@amsa.com.
